nodes.text: Zepashi was a Zabrak male who was imprisoned on Burnin Konn by Imperial purge troopers. The Empire had suspected that he and Fryoto were affiliated with the Trade Spine League and knew of Galactic Emperor Sheev Palpatine's death. He and Fryoto were both rescued by a young smuggler in an uprising against Governor Ubrik Adelhard's Iron Blockade.

Zepashi is a non-player character created for Star Wars: Uprising, a canon mobile game developed by Kabam for iOS and Android operating systems. The player must liberate him and Fryoto from Imperial captivity in order to complete Story Mission 65, entitled "Even Families".
